import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils/config";import"./users.css";import{Button}from"reactstrap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Users=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users"),{method:"GET",credentials:"include"});if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Failed to fetch users");}const data=await response.json();setUsers(data.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching users:",error);setLoading(false);}};fetchUsers();},[]);const deleteValue=async userId=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/").concat(userId),{method:"DELETE",credentials:"include"});alert("User deleted");if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Failed to delete user");}// Update the state to reflect the changes
setUsers(prevUsers=>prevUsers.filter(user=>user._id!==userId));}catch(error){console.error("Error deleting user:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User List"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-card-container",children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",user.email]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:()=>deleteValue(user._id),children:"Delete"})]},user._id))})]});};export default Users;
